title: Give trees a chance: the story of Terania Creek
creator_credit: Jeni Kendell and Sydney Filmmakers Co-operative
brief_description: Terania Creek is the site of a threatened rainforest. Presents the stand taken by conservationists against the Forestry Commission and police to try to save the last of the virgin rainforest at Terania Creek and to argue for an environmental impact study. Narrated by Jack Thompson.
